publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3785 Mr Andy Kerr: Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill - Stage 1—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) (No.4) Bill.Supported by: Mr Jack McConnell*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Patricia Ferguson*
